ISSUE.TITLE: Allow admins to change username but prevent customer from doing it
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: We should allow administrators to change customer usernames but prevent a customer from doing it Of course, we should do it only when appropriate setting ("usernames" AND "allow customers to change username") is enabled Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/38265/suggestion-allow-admins-to-change-username-but-prevent-customer-from-doing-it.aspx

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #765 Allow admins to change username regardless of the "allow customers to change username" setting
